pages.title: Raffle Vaults
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Raid Vaults$() are a special Vault which you $(#F00)cannot Complete$(). Each room spawns with a $(#033dfc)Raid Controller$(), which will spawn a random wave of Mobs, adding negative and positive effects to $(#033dfc)the Vault$().

pages.title: Mechanics
pages.text: Each Completed Raid will open up $(#033dfc)3 (if available) Paths$() for each direction, with a $(#033dfc)Raid Controller$() in each of them. This can go on indefinetly until the $(#033dfc)Vault Timer$() expires.

To roll this Objective, you need to apply a $(#033dfc)Seal of the Devastator$() to a $(l:get_started/vault_crystal)Vault Crystal$() if the Crystal is not exhausted.   These Seals may be $(#033dfc)crafted$() or obtained by other methods, like $(#033dfc)looting in the Vault$() or purchasing them in the $(#033dfc)Soul Shard Shop$()
